sub_title: Project Manager at Yokogawa Europe Solutions B.V.
summary:
An accomplished project manager with more than 15 years of technical and management experience in software application development, and industrial systems projects with a proven ability to deliver exceptional results.
As skilled PMP, I am experienced in both sales and project management lifecycles. I have proven experience in evaluating and recommending strategic execution plans to meet customer needs, as well as a desire to contribute to the business success and reduce costs.

I’m fully adept with multiple project management execution methodologies including Waterfall and Agile (Scrum, Kanban, and XP).

I am committed to developing beneficial relationships to increase sales and growth in emerging markets using expert communication, negotiation, and relationship techniques.

Executing domestic and international projects in Hydrogen, Oil& Gas, Chemical, IT, Pharmaceutical and Terminal management industries.
Project scope of work comprises the following:
•	Development of new software applications (using different programming languages).
•	Delivery of a complete Integrated Control and Safety System, Field Instrumentation, F&G devices, Remote Instrument Buildings, SecurePlant, PIMS, Data Historian and other Software packages.
